cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 1 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: Standard 12 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: The perfect choice for solo travellers or groups of friends. Our dorm rooms feature our brand-new designer bunks with built-in personal lights and charging stations.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Standard 14 Bed Female Dorm
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: The perfect choice for solo travellers or groups of friends. Our dorm rooms feature our brand-new designer bunks with built-in personal lights and charging stations.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 15th Oct 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 15th Oct 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
